content: the quiet rib beanie is a simple comforting knit designed for relaxed evenings and mindless stitching worked bottom-up in classic 1×1 rib this beanie is a quick project you can finish in just a few sittings making it perfect for last-minute gifts or a satisfying cast-on between bigger projects the pattern keeps things intentionally simple letting the rhythm of ribbing do the work the result is a timeless unisex hat with a flexible fit that suits almost everyone knit it once and you ll likely come back to it again and again materials yarn approx 70 80 g dk-weight yarn about 240 m per 100 g sample shown in rico essentials merino dk needles 4 mm us 6 16-inch circular needles plus 4 mm us 6 dpns notions scissors tapestry needle measuring tape stitch markers sizes kid adult small adult medium adult large finished circumference unstretched 12 13 5 15 16 5 in / 30 5 34 38 41 5 cm comfortably stretches to fit a wide range of head sizes finished height uncuffed 9 5 10 5 11 5 12 5 in / 24 26 5 30 32 cm gauge 30 stitches and 27 row = 4 in / 10 cm in 1×1 rib unstretched construction bottom-up 1×1 rib throughout simple shaping at the crown
